scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:assets && npm run build:ts && npm run build:content && npm run build:injected && npm run build:main-world && powershell "Compress-Archive -Path 'public\*' -DestinationPath 'evidence-monitor-extension.zip' -Force" && echo Extension packaged as evidence-extension.zip
scripts.build:assets: cp src/manifest.json public/ && cp src/assets/styles/hud.css public/ && cp src/assets/html/popup.html public/ && cp -r src/assets/icons public/
scripts.package: npm run build && powershell "Compress-Archive -Path 'public\*' -DestinationPath 'evidence-monitor-extension.zip' -Force" && echo Extension packaged as evidence-monitor-extension.zip
